itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 18, 2013
contentencoded:
So...what's Quantitative Easing again? Don't worry, it's not too late to ask. 

Businesses rally behind a controversial new set of math and literacy standards, which they view as crucial to preparing an educated workforce.

A huge chunk of immigrant-founded start-ups were developed by Chinese and Indian entrepreneurs. But now a new group is emerging on the scene -- Latinos.
title: PODCAST: Quantitative Easing, explained
description: Quantitative Easing gets explained. A look at why businesses are heavily promoting the Common Core education initiative. And a new demographic is making big inroads in the tech world -- Latinos. That's all on today's podcast.
